functions.tag: {RepairCost:1000000000,display:{Name:'{"text":"鋭利なクロスボウ","color":"gold","bold":true,"italic":false}',Lore:['{"text":"ある日人類はとある考えに行き着いた。","color":"dark_aqua","italic":false}','{"text":"引き絞る時間がもったいないと。","color":"dark_aqua","italic":false}','{"text":"こうして人類は殴る使い方を編み出した。","color":"dark_aqua","italic":false}']},Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:sharpness",lvl:5s},{id:"minecraft:fire_aspect",lvl:5s},{id:"minecraft:piercing",lvl:5s},{id:"minecraft:quick_charge",lvl:10s}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Name:"generic.attack_speed",Amount:5,Operation:0,UUID:[I;0,1,0,1],Slot:"mainhand"}]}
